title: Owl Money Manager
summary: User friendly, modern, and owl-wise money manager. Now also on Android Wear.
description: Brand new, Android Lolipop inspired, version of popular Owl Money ManagerThe app was rebuilt from scratch to offer better stability and modern user experience.Current users of this and PRO app will be able to import their current database.App offers:* Dedicated watch app (Android Wear)* Android Loliop user experience* Full off-line support* Photo personalisation for any data* Tracking most important data concerning current month from the app home screen* Saving assistant* Widget that display latest balance data and allowing to quickly register new operations* Various statistics presented to you as tables and charts* Scheduled operations* Elastic displayed currency configuration* Partners module allowing to share the same budget between users* Automatic cloud sync simplified as possible, quick single sign in* Sync between unlimited number of devices and accounts. You can invite familly members to share the budget,* Groups of operations, for easy tracking of overall events costs, like holidays* CSV exporterWear app let's you to quickly register expenses and incomes straight from your wrist.
descriptionHTML:
Brand new, Android Lolipop inspired, version of popular Owl Money Manager


The app was rebuilt from scratch to offer better stability and modern user experience.


Current users of this and PRO app will be able to import their current database.


App offers:
* Dedicated watch app (Android Wear)
* Android Loliop user experience
* Full off-line support
* Photo personalisation for any data
* Tracking most important data concerning current month from the app home screen
* Saving assistant
* Widget that display latest balance data and allowing to quickly register new operations
* Various statistics presented to you as tables and charts
* Scheduled operations
* Elastic displayed currency configuration
* Partners module allowing to share the same budget between users
* Automatic cloud sync simplified as possible, quick single sign in
* Sync between unlimited number of devices and accounts. You can invite familly members to share the budget,
* Groups of operations, for easy tracking of overall events costs, like holidays
* CSV exporter

Wear app let's you to quickly register expenses and incomes straight from your wrist.
comments: Fantastic app Great and simile interface to keep track of income, spending and budgets. I've used this on a daily basis and find it very easy to use. Only issue being I get paid mid month and the app appears restart your spending based on a calendar month. There may be a way to adjust this but I've not located yet. Still a great app.
Widget does not update Love the fact that it works with my android wear but the widget on the phone does not update immediately after I keyed in a new expense. Please fix. Thanks.
(+) Partners module allowing to share the same budget between users. (-) Monthly subscription.

Great potential but has an issue Good app, potentially could go mainstream but you need to stop it from asking me to donate. You should use well placed adverts if you need to raise money it's more effective and won't get in the way as much.

Liked it at one time Just updated app and it won't let me use it unless i link it to my google account and allow it to tell people when I'm logged into it.... thats no one else's buisness regardless if they are friends and family or not... uninstalling and never coming back

Love it.  Issues: Schedule operation screen clears description field if you click some of the other fields like the date or category. "POWTARZANIE" (??) needs to be translated to English. Need a way to delete categories, if possible.
